channel.title: [pi] pk kills and top 10 pkers online[pi]
channel.description:
Okay how do i make it where when you kill a player you get a pk kill and it cant be changed the only way it can change is if you get more kills and it goes up.
Secondly i want to make a pk scoreboard when you click a a sign a interface pops up(about to add that) how do i make it where the people top 10 people with most pk kills(online) will be shown in there position and with how many pk kills like below
[IMG]http://i856.photobucket.com/albums/ab129/im_a_noob_jesusk0/erm%20idk/0000.png[/img]

item.title: [pi] pk kills and top 10 pkers online[pi]
item.dc:creator: @99matt99 99matt99
item.description:
@99matt99 wrote:

well can you like help me a bit will it be like this

add to player

pk_kills

and then add this

if(!PlayerKilling.hostOnList(o, c.connectedFrom)) {
	PlayerKilling.addHostToList(o, c.connectedFrom);
	o.pk_kills +=1;
	o.sendMessage("You have recently defeated "+c.playerName+", so you don't receive any PK Kills.");

under

if(!PlayerKilling.hostOnList(o, c.connectedFrom)) {
	PlayerKilling.addHostToList(o, c.connectedFrom);
	o.pcPoints +=1;
	o.getItems().addItem(995,500000);
	o.sendMessage("You now have [@red@"+o.pcPoints+"@bla@] PK Points! You also receive 500K coins.");
} else {
	o.sendMessage("You have recently defeated "+c.playerName+", so you don't receive any PK Points.");

?
